name: Looking for a 4 fighter/16 Bard /10 AA build?
author: Avatar6666

posts.author: Avatar6666
posts.content: Looking for a 4 fighter/16 Bard /10 AA build?

posts.author: gkorjax
posts.content:
This would be a good place to start,
https://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/bui ... index.html
I suspect that members of this guild have refined the builds from the old days...so there might be some better ones in the level 40 builds section of these forums...

posts.author: gkorjax
posts.content: Damn..not sure why I can't edit my own post yet...I see...level 30...well...I'd still suggest using the search engine, and looking in both the level 30 and level 40 sections of these forums...

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content: I looked, there isn't anything for level 30 that he wants.

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
A couple of questions, if I may, Avatar6666?

- Where do you intend to play the build? Is it a level 30 PW, or is it for specific modules? Are there any particular variations from vanilla NwN rules?
- Why have you chosen the classes you have, and in the numbers you have?
- Would xp penalties be important for you or not?

It would really help if you could follow the Build Request Guidelines. It helps us to help you get what you want.

Thanks

posts.author: Avatar6666
posts.content: I am trying to build a bard that can do damage on Knights of Normath server.

posts.author: Stagmeister
posts.content:
Avatar6666 wrote:
Oct 12, 2020
I am trying to build a bard that can do damage on Knights of Normath server.
Well, like I said, we need to know more about that server and its rules. Follow the guidelines.
